name: Microsoft FreeCell Saved Game
summary: Learn about .FREECELLSAVE-MS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FREECELLSAVE-MS files are automatically saved by the game to the [user]\​Saved Games\​Microsoft Games\​FreeCell\​ directory.

description: Saved game file created by FreeCell, a free solitaire card game included with Microsoft Games for Windows; stores the state of the game after the user has exited the program and chosen the Save button; enables users to continue where they left off.
